subtitle: Know Your Obligations
understandingText: Data transfer involves the movement of data...
importanceText: Ensuring the security of data during transfer is vital...

importancePoints.title: Confidentiality
importancePoints.description: Data should only be accessible to authorized individuals.

importancePoints.title: Integrity
importancePoints.description: Data should remain accurate and unaltered during transfer.

importancePoints.title: Availability
importancePoints.description: Data should be available to authorized users when needed.

practicesTitle: Best Practices for Secure Data Transfer
practicesIntro: To maintain the security and integrity of data...

practices.title: Encryption
practices.description: Always use encryption to protect data...

complianceText: Organizations must comply with relevant data protection laws...
